org.hkijena.acaq5.api

Class ACAQGraphRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.acaq5.api.ACAQGraphRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ACAQRunnable

    public class ACAQGraphRunner
extends Object
implements ACAQRunnable
    Executes an ACAQAlgorithmGraph. This does not do any data storage or caching. Use this class for nested algorithm graph runs (like GraphWrapperAlgorithm) Use ACAQRun for full project runs.
